translations: n.变形量；歪斜（deflection 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 射束偏转；梁的挠度；梁弯曲度
变位（偏离）曲线；挠曲（挠度）曲线
垂直偏转；帧偏转；高低提前量
水平偏转，水平偏差；行偏转系数
静载挠度；静载弯曲；静态压缩量；静态偏差

sentences.sentence: And on the right, you notice that there are many of those sharp deflections.
sentences.translation: 在右侧，大家看到，有很多明显的变位。

sentences.sentence: The only special features allowed are stress stiffening and large deflections.
sentences.translation: 仅仅应力刚化和大变形是被允许的特殊特征。

sentences.sentence: This permits the roller set to align freely in the outer-ring raceway, thus compensating for misalignments and shaft deflections (see Figure 1.43).
sentences.translation: 这允许设置为自由对齐辊在外圈滚道，从而为失调和轴挠度进行补偿(见图1.43)。
